title: Tinkerer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Every night you aren't visited, craft a gun.
- You can attack a player with your gun, dealing a Powerful attack to them consuming the gun.
- You can give guns to other players, which they can use to deal a Basic attack in place of their normal ability. Each player can only recieve one gun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only hold one gun at a time.
- If you attack a player with a gun, you cannot craft a gun that night.
- Your gun is consumed even if your target does not die.
- If you are resurrected for any reason, you will not have a gun even if you had one when you died.
- You may not multitask.
- Control Immune

desc:
Post 11
*Many times has that finger pulled a trigger. You are far too dull to use these hands for anything else.*
